1160710.name: Vestige of the Past - Soundtrack
1160710.description:
This is the original soundtrack for Vestige of the Past, and contains both FLAC and MP3 formats.

There are 35 tracks for a total listening time of 1 hour, 1 minute, and 54 seconds.

Profit from the soundtrack is being split 50/50 with the musician.
